member.name: T:billitems.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:billitems.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:billitems.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.RowStatusFlag
member.summary: True, if all rows are defined with RowStatus, active rowstatus is 0, previous history in 1,2,3...etc

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.HeaderRowStatusFlag
member.summary: If it is a subtable of headertable ,Hold rowstatusflag of header table

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.HeaderRowStatusNo
member.summary: If it is a subtable of headertable ,hold last RowStatusNo of header table

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.SqlUpdation
member.summary: True, if modifications in the table are taken place for this table therefore sql statements are executed.

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.CurrDt
member.summary: Current DataTable associated to sql Table with final values of fields of sql table used in sql querry.(MultyRowsSqlHandling=True)

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.CurrRow
member.summary: Current DataRow associated to sql Table with final values of fields of sql table used in sql querry.(MultyRowsSqlHandling=False)

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.CurrRowsArray
member.summary: An array of Current DataRows associated to sql Table with final values of fields of sql table used in sql querry.(MultyRowsSqlHandling=False)

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.PrevDt
member.summary: Previous DataTable associated to sql Table with old values of fields from sql table used in sql querry.(MultyRowsSqlHandling=True)

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.PrevRow
member.summary: Previous DataRow associated to sql Table with old values of fields from sql table used in sql querry.(MultyRowsSqlHandling=Flase)

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.FieldsFinalValues
member.summary: To hold final values of Table Fields ,Values are AutoAssinged for Y,O,R,S,D,A type fields

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.TableOpenMode
member.summary: TableOpenMode of Parent table ,acceptable values Append=A,Modify=M,Delete=D,View=V

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.WhereClauseDefault
member.summary: WhereClauseDefault is a default condition to fetch active datarow/datatable from sql table )

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.TableType
member.summary: Table Type=M (Main Table), S=Sub Table,H=Header Table

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.ParentTables
member.summary: Comma separated Names of ParentTables Tables for this table

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.RepeatAsNew
member.summary: True if previous row is added as new row with new primary key

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.TableEntryType
member.summary: TableEntryFlag(A=Append,M=Modify,D=Delete,S=Initial Flag)

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.FieldsPlusCollection
member.summary: An array of collection having the values of keys are [Table,LastKeyField,Condition,Variables] where all are string and varibles as hashtable(Keys are variablenames and values are variable values]

member.name: T:billitems.billitems.billitems.Fields
member.summary: Enumeration of all fields of table.

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.GroupFieldsType
member.summary: A hashtable with Key of row (PrimaryKey types Y=Always,R=Key with row status,S=RowStatus,O=OtherKey,D=Increase In DataTable(StartValue will be LastValue from SqlTable),E=ExcludeToCompare,C=Common value in datatable,I=Value Input by user,C=Calculated value,T=Default Text field),P=Increase in datatable (Start value will be 1 ) ,A=AutoPick Field Value of other table

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.AllFields
member.summary: Comma separated all fields with m1 table alias.

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.AllColumns
member.summary: Comma separated all fields without table alias.

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.PrimaryKey
member.summary: Primary key of table

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.PrimaryKeyValue
member.summary: Primary key value of table

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.PreviousSameRows
member.summary: RowNos. of PrevDt which are same in CurrDt

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.PreviousExtraRows
member.summary: RowNos. of PrevDt which are not available in CurrDt

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.CurrentSameRows
member.summary: RowNos. of CurrDt which are same in PrevDt

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.CurrentExtraRows
member.summary: RowNos. of CurrDt which are not available in PrevDt

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.ServerDatabase
member.summary: ServerDatabase in the format 0_srv_0.0_mdf_0

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.Server
member.summary: Server in the format 0_srv_0

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.Database
member.summary: Database in the format 0_mdf_0

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.TableWithSQLPath
member.summary: Full sqlpath of table

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.TableName
member.summary: Table Name as string

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.ExcludeFromCompare
member.summary: Comma separated fields excluded from comparing datarows

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.PlusOneFields
member.summary: Comma separated Fields of Table which will be set as increamental values starts from last field's value of stored sql table.

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.PlusOneColumns
member.summary: Comma separated Columns of CurrDt DataTable which will be set as increamental values starts from last column value of datatable

member.name: P:billitems.billitems.billitems.SameValueFields
member.summary: Comma separated Columns of CurrDt DataTable which will be set as same values for all rows of currdt

member.summary: TextField of data table used for default sorting

member.summary: KeyPlusGroups of increamenting fields for sql querry,permissible groups are Y,R,S,O,D

member.summary: SchemaTable as datatable with columns Column_Name,Data_Type,Size

member.summary: Type of rows insertion/updation for sql querry
